## Examples

```{r, output="asis"}
library(SimpleFreqs)

freq(iris, Species, plot=F)
```

## 

```{r, output="asis"}
library(SimpleFreqs)
library(dplyr)
data("storms")
freq(storms, day, plot=F)

```
